alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clarendon; Lee; Southeastern Orangeburg; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 10:25PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Lee, southeastern Calhoun, Clarendon, east central Sumter and east central Orangeburg Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1025 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sardis to near Alcolu to near Elloree. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Manning, Summerton, Elloree, Alcolu, Woods Bay State Park, Santee State Park, Santee Cooper Regional Airport, Turbeville, Poplar Creek Landing, St. Paul, Stumphole Landing, Foreston, Gable, Davis Station and Shiloh. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 99 and 126, and between mile markers 140 and 146. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central South Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Clarendon; Lee; Southeastern Orangeburg; Sumter
